nodes.text: Vinyor Tesh had a father who was a male researcher working on the planet Manaan. During the Devastation of Manaan, he was killed along with his partner by the invading Imperial forces. His young son was saved by a visiting Jedi named Laotah, who took the child to Coruscant to be trained at the Jedi Temple.

Vinyor Tesh's father was mentioned in the Codex entry for Master Vinyor Tesh in the 2019 expansion Onslaught to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic by the company BioWare.
